DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : - compare pharmacokinetics Replenine®-VF Replenine® high purity Factor IX concentrate , give bolus dose 75IU/kg . - compare 1st 2nd pharmacokinetic assessment Replenine®-VF ( conduct 3 month apart ) recovery patient change batch . - evaluate Replenine®-VF term clinical tolerance safety patient severe haemophilia B .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Pharmacokinetics Safety Replenine®-VF , Replenine® Other Factor IX Haemophilia B
DOC.criteria: Patients age 12 year At least 20 exposure suffer severe Haemophilia B without inhibitor Factor IX Replenine® high purity Factor IX product
